data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Meesho Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from December 10 2025 the Equity Shares of Meesho Ltd (Scrip Code: 544632) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251209- dated December 09 2025.
